# Explosives for Avalanche Control RISO
### Request for Standing Offer (RFSA)

**Reference Number:** WS4276103650-Doc4276159904

**Solicitation Number:** WS4276103650

**Publication Date:** November 28, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** January 9, 2024, 14:00 EST

## Summary

The Parks Canada Agency is seeking a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the supply and delivery of various explosive products for avalanche control on an as-needed basis to various national mountain parks.

## Description of Requirements

The proposed Standing Offer is for a period from award contract to December 31, 2024, with two (2) one-year option periods. The Contractor must comply with all requirements identified in the [Annex Statement Of Requirement](#annex-statement-of-requirement) in order to be considered compliant.

## End-User Entities

The successful Contractor will supply the required explosive products to Parks Canada Agency for use in various national mountain parks.

## Trade Agreements

Tenders are invited under the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* [Additional agreements listed below]

## Regions of Opportunity

No regions are specified.

## Regions of Delivery

The required explosive products will be delivered to Canada.

## Contracting Entity

The Contracting Entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

## Contact Information

For any questions or clarification, please contact:

Zumbado Diaz, Willy (SPAC/PSPC)
willy.zumbadodiaz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Important Notes

* All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by January 9, 2024, at 14:00 EST.
* Bids submitted after 14:00 EST will be considered non-responsive.

## Annex Statement Of Requirement

Please refer to the Annex for detailed information regarding the requirements of this RFSA.
